titleStmt.title: Richard T. Garnett to James F. Robinson
CWG7879

availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

msIdentifier.repository: Kentucky Department for Libraries and Archives
msIdentifier.collection: Office of the Governor, James F. Robinson: Appointments by the Governor, Civil Appointments, 1862-1863

body.p:
Columbia Ky.
Febry 3. 1863
To His Excellency
Gov. J. F. Robinson
Dr Sir

You will find enclosed herein copies of orders of Court (Adair County) showing two vacancies of Justices of the Peace in this County viz one Wm F. Grady dead Geo W Ewing removed from district -- I suggest John Mourning & James Cox as fit and proper persons for District No 1 in the place of Geo W Ewing removed -- and Phillip A Moss & John Brock as fit and proper persons for District No 4 in place of Wm F. Grady Decd to fill said Vacancies.
The unfinished business of those whose vacancies are to be filled requires that you make the appointments at as an early a day as practicable.

Very Respt
Yours &c
Richd T. Garnett
Presiding Judge Adair Co
P. S. I have Suggested 2 Names in each District from which the appointments can be made.
